SEARCH
Module OOP
Package OOPProject

Interface PatientMedRecords

public interface PatientMedRecords
The PatientMedRecords interface defines the methods for managing and interacting with patient medical records in the system. It includes functionality to view and update medical records for a specific patient.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    updateMedicalRecords(String PatientID, MedicalRecord records)
    Updates the medical record for a given patient with the specified details.
    MedicalRecord
    viewMedicalRecords(String PatientID)
    Retrieves the medical record for a given patient based on their unique ID.

  • Method Details

    • viewMedicalRecords

      MedicalRecord viewMedicalRecords(String PatientID)
      Retrieves the medical record for a given patient based on their unique ID.
      Parameters:
      PatientID - The unique identifier of the patient whose medical records are to be viewed.
      Returns:
      The MedicalRecord associated with the specified patient.

    • updateMedicalRecords

      void updateMedicalRecords(String PatientID, MedicalRecord records)
      Updates the medical record for a given patient with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      PatientID - The unique identifier of the patient whose medical records are to be updated.
      records - The updated MedicalRecord object containing the new details.
